item.title: Trump to Resume Loan Forgiveness for Teachers, Borrowers Until 2028
item.description: The Trump administration says it will cancel student debt for millions of borrowers under a new agreement with the American Federation of Teachers.

item.title: GOP, Trump Hold Line as Shutdown Enters 4th Week
item.description: As the government shutdown enters its fourth week, Senate Republicans are headed to the White House on Tuesday - not for urgent talks on how to end it...
